items.sentence: Tom would never say something like that to Mary.
Tom left the premises without anyone seeing him.
Why didn't you tell me that I shouldn't do that?
Why didn't you tell me that I needed to do that?
The taller a tree is, the harder it is to climb.
A big tree in the field was struck by lightning.
Tom drank about three times as much as Mary did.
There's no hope of that happening any time soon.
I didn't know whether Tom had to do that or not.
I don't care that Tom wasn't having a good time.
